milestones.name: M1_local_core
tasks: Install deps: expo-sqlite, expo-av, expo-location, expo-file-system, uuid
Implement mode selector: transcribe / type / sound
TRANSCRIBE: press-and-hold record -> create placeholder entry -> run transcription stub -> update entry
TYPE: create entry from typed text (no audio)
SOUND: press-and-hold record -> save audio (engine=none) -> entry shows [Audio] duration
Home/List screen with 3 columns and toggle to show coords column
Entry detail screen: edit transcript/text + edit location name
Location alias: on location name edit with coords -> upsert place_aliases by locationKey (geohash precision 8)
acceptance_criteria: App runs in Expo Go on Android
User can create entries in all 3 modes
Editing location name updates alias mapping for future entries at same locationKey
